A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute nonsense storywise and extremely racist. The two leads of color are turned from brave\, kind\, competent men to useless coward and hotheaded\, reckless idiots. The first female star wars lead is completely robbed of her agency through the whole movie and upstaged by Literal Fascist Warlord Kylo Ren. Luke Skywalker's character was completely trashed. None of the decisions the characters make throughout the story are congruent with their characters or the SW universe lore. Would have preferred 2 and a half hours of Jar Jar Binks adventuring through space to be quite honest.
